title: Curious by Britney Spears for Women, Eau De Parfum Spray, 1.7 Ounce
description: Introduced in 2004. Recommended use: casual.When applying any fragrance please consider that there are several factors which can affect the natural smell of your skin and, in turn, the way a scent smells on you.  For instance, your mood, stress level, age, body chemistry, diet, and current medications may all alter the scents you wear.  Similarly, factor such as dry or oily skin can even affect the amount of time a fragrance will last after being applied

title: Avon ANEW CLINICAL Advanced Retexturizing Peel 42 ml 1.47 fl oz
description: Now, in 1 easy step! See results superior* to a professional 35% glycolic peel. At home. No appointment necessary. The advanced exfoliator safely retexturizes and resurfaces skin. Formulated with soothing botanicals that help nourish and calm skin. Peels away dullness and visible age damage so healthier skin cells can surface. 30 unscented pads.*In 6 of 8 attributes tested over a 7-week period....
